website_summaries.verdict: A superb GoPro accessory kit that offers a terrific combination of affordability and quality.
pros: Sold with a headband, chest strap, bicycle clip and handlebar mounting clamp to provide you with lots of ways to use your GoPro
Head strap is compatible with all GoPro cameras
Includes sticky pads that perform consistently
cons: Bicycle clip and handlebar mounting clamp consist of low-quality plastic and tend to break easily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kit to optimize your GoPro and get all the different shots and angles you want
customer_reviews.text: Perfect accessory for the kids new GoPro. They used a bunch of the attachments when making a movie on vacation. Nice selection of stuff for a reasonable price and allowed them to be ultra creative between the tripod, water float, long selfie stick, and arm, body and head mounts they got a bunch of different shots and had a lot of fun. Everything works with standard gopro connectors so it is easy to attach and remove. Comes with some sticky pads as well so you can put some mounts in semi permanent locations (maybe above the basketball hoop this spring).
customer_reviews.author: Dave H.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Complete Waste of Money - Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Complete garbage. Cheap plastic mounts cracked on 1st use. The “floating” mount provided for water use, filled with water and sank in the ocean. I almost lost my $400 camera the first time I used it. The selfie stick is showing signs of rust and I haven’t even unwrapped it yet. This is the most disappointing amazon purchase I’ve made in the last 12 months. I’m beginning to suspect the good reviews on Amazon are unreliable. There’s no way that many people were happy with this product. It’s cheap, brittle, poorly constructed crap.
customer_reviews.author: SLH

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and comes with a lot of pieces for the price. Pretty good buy. I will admit that there are so many pieces that many of them are a puzzle to me. If you are a serious action vlogger, I think it would be perfect. I don't do much action vlogging but for the price it really cant be beat. The pieces that I have used seem really sturdy and dependable so over all I am very happy with my purchase. The one thing I would suggest is maybe having a sheet to explain what all of the different pieces do. I also love the tote! That definitely comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: latasha whitelow

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal, even if it isn't the highest quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely incredible option of mounts and screws for my GoPro. The alligator clip is really handy and very strong. The three legged flexible mount is kind of flimsy, especially at the camera connection and was not very reliable for time-lapses due to susceptibility to wind. The extended handle works fine even if it's a little cheap and the float mount is pretty much a must have if you're bringing your GoPro into anything besides a pool. Not everything in here is really well made but for the price, you're offered a wide variety of choices you aren't too worried about breaking. This is a great deal for a package.
customer_reviews.author: TopGun4815

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: for now it's probably too much for me!!! I was only looking for a chest and a head strap but this was great deal to pass up. There is another strap that I can use for my bike which I didn't think of when I was looking for accessories so that's a bonus. Actually the rest of the goodies are bonuses also! The quality looks sturdy and I didn't find anything that felt cheap. There are many duplicate items but that's not a bad thing as it's good replacement for when the matching item gets lost. I may not get to use most of it immediately but I can see using more of as the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: The OC

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Obviously you get what you pay for and this is a perfect example. You really do get a lot in regards to quantity, and if I had those cameras that were under $50 I think this would be ideal. But for my $300 GoPro, the quality just isn't there to make me feel secure enough to use. The selfie stick is flimsy, the wrist straps on some items seem like they'll bus;, just not worth the risk on a GoPro. I would definitely recommend this for cameras that are under $50, but not for $300 cameras. I ended up buying a separate selfie stick and another floating stick, worth the extra couple of dollars just to feel more secure.
customer_reviews.author: Jez

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the water first use and I lost my GoPro!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used these was on a tow rope while kneeboarding, and the cheap plastic snapped, sending my GoPro to the bottom of the river forever. I had filmed something similar on a kneeboard years ago with another kit, and it worked great. Now because of the cheap plastic they decided to use, I don't have a GoPro, just a bunch of leftover mounts that I wouldn't trust even if I got a new camera. Very disappointed. Either don't buy these or don't use them anywhere you might lose your camera!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: The best bang for your buck for a Go Pro Accessory kit. But...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this kit not too long ago. I was a bit skeptic of how cheap the kit is (10 bucks), but it actually is the best bargain if you are looking for a GoPro accessory kit. The materials are decently made. I tried every single accessory and it does the job right. Had to give it four stars because the foam padding that it came with got squished when I opened it. Overall, it's a perfect bargain if you are looking for a cheap Go Pro Accessory Kit, but just don't expect it to come in one piece :) Edit: 2 weeks in, threads started falling apart with light usage of the case.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Just take good care of it and it'll get you your money's ...
customer_reviews.text: everything works and is functional. The selfie stick is probably my most used accessory, and it's holding up as it arrived the first day. I've had it for over 2 months so far. The tripod fell apart after a month of use, But i seriously put that thing through hell. I've shoved these things in my backpack carelessly. You get what you pay for. Just take good care of it and it'll get you your money's worth. Though, if you're into risky adventures. Definitely get something with more durability. I'd recommend this for the light travelers and tourists. For sightseeing, hikes, and zip-lining...
customer_reviews.author: Neil Cardinez

customer_reviews.title: I am glad the Go Pro was not on the bike mount
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the set mainly for the bike mount. I mounted the bike mount as soon as I received the set. Since I am new to Go Pro and hadn't figured out how to use it, I rode my bike without the Go Pro. I stopped suddenly at a red light and bumped the bike mount, which broke. I am glad the Go Pro was not on the bike mount. I am disappointed that the plastic is not made to handle small bumps. I had another occasion to use the mini tripod, and it seemed to work well. I have not yet used many of the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Smurfette39635

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - Lost Go Pro
customer_reviews.text: For standard use, nothing adventurous this product is good. I had use several of the items for swimming, this time around I decided to use the chest mount for a white water rafting trip. I secured the clip, pulled both directions ensure it was on correctly. However, after some light water rafting. I ended up with a chest strap and no go pro. I was on the boat the entire time, a few waves is all it took for it to fall off. This is fraud! Do not buy, seller has not replied to my request for replacement go pro.
customer_reviews.author: Usercpp

customer_reviews.title: Very good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This kit comes with a ton of different accessories, more than I will ever need. It is shipped in a nice drawstring bag that is helpful when carrying around everything. I've tried several of the accessories out and they all seem very durable. They are all made out of plastic but definitely seem strong enough for typical activities you might use them for (hiking, boating, etc.). You might want to invest in stronger individual pieces if you were planning on using your Go Pro in harsher environments, but these more than enough for the tasks I needed them for.
customer_reviews.author: tigersfan

customer_reviews.title: Great introductory starter pack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great intro starter kit. Purchasing this will help you realize what you use the most and should invest a little more in. GoPro accessories are expensive and purchasing everything you need upfront isn’t always an option for everyone. This will give you a great understand of what’s out there and what accessories for your lifestyle. The Quality is no where near the durability and dependability of GoPro brand but for the price point this is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Shayne S.

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great kit with a huge variety. I love the curved sticky mounts...they really hold up well on dirt bike helmets. I really bought it for the tripod. I've used the tripod for snorkeling as a handle and to dive down and set up my go pro on the artificial reefs to film fish and other snorkelers. The flexible legs are the best. The additional attachments seem to be of good quality too, just haven't used to much more of the kit yet.
customer_reviews.author: rj4wd

customer_reviews.title: Great in the sea
customer_reviews.text: I used this kit on a trip to Palawan Island in the Philippines, and it help up great! I spent pretty much three full days in the sea with my GoPro and the flotation device. It worked like a charm and I never felt like I was going to lose my camera. The screw rusted really fast – it started after the first day, actually – but it held together fine, and the pack comes with several extras, so I'm not to worried about it. This is a great kit for anyone on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Jumper

customer_reviews.title: More bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for! GoPro accessories are so expensive. This bundle comes with so much. Bought this for my husband to use and he was so impressed with everything it came with. We let our three year old use the chest strap attachment and he was so excited to run around the house with it. The bag is great to store all unused items in it. Look forward to going on vacation and trying the different attachments out. This is definitely worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: l. armstrong

customer_reviews.title: the tripod is terrible. better off spending a few more bucks and ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not very extreme but i dont think this set would survive even me. My oem gopro clip wont work with the set to tight to fit in the slots, the body mount and head strap are decent, the floating thing is a joke, and the tripod! man this was the reason i got this set, the tripod is terrible. better off spending a few more bucks and get everything seperate, thats what i ended updoing. giving it a 3 star because the clips that do come with the kit are solid they do use 3M adhesive whick is good, and all the body straps were decent.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Wide variety and functional
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Wide variety, they all seem functional and well built, has spare parts CONS: cheap tripod
customer_reviews.author: GetGad

customer_reviews.title: Good Functionality but Can Be Overkill
customer_reviews.text: I own the GoPro Session and these accessories work perfectly. Bought this for a beach vacation to take snorkeling, hiking, etc but the package is very large and not very conducive to stowing in luggage. A lot of the parts are redundant and do not apply directly to the Session so I was able to leave a good portion of this at home and make the packaging manageable enough to pack in suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!! Currently looking to see if Amazon audits merchants. I believe this is a merchant that sells really low quality items. I used this on motorcycle for the very first time and it snapped at only 45mph and destroyed my case in the process now I have to spend $50 to get a new one. Not my first kit of GoPro accessories have had plenty that have lasted years with daily use that have survived spirited riding far faster than 45mph. Plenty of other options for sure you should skip this one.
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: The handlebar mount snapped after two months of normal use ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking to figure out how to use your GoPro, then this is a great option. Then, if you need to upgrade, you can buy top-quality versions of the one or two mounts you actually use. My handlebar mount snapped after two months of normal use, but they quickly offered to send two replacements. I give four stars because of the quick response and because there really is a lot of good stuff in this bag for the price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hardwick

customer_reviews.title: The blue bag keeping all the pieces together is super convenient too
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the original GoPro Hero (ancient, I know) but still fits every accessory nonetheless. Wanted some mounts to use on an upcoming vacation and you cannot beat the amount of goods you get for this price. The entire package is less than half the price of a GoPro brand selfie stick. Yes it is a cheaper plastic but it does the job and secures your camera. The blue bag keeping all the pieces together is super convenient too. Excited to try all these out and would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this kit
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this kit. I put off getting accessories for my gopro for so long, so I never used it. This kit is really great. Except for the selfie stick. That thing kind of sucks. It doesn't really hold the camera steady, and after a few months of using it, the telescoping pieces started to come apart. but all the rest of it works great. I don't think twice about slapping a mount on something now, because I have so many of them!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Van Pelt

customer_reviews.title: The number of accessories might be tempting but within a ...
customer_reviews.text: The number of accessories might be tempting but within a few uses, the wrist strap broke off when we were going in for a dive. Thankfully, the ocean floor was only 10 meters deep and we were able to retrieve the GoPro but you get what you pay. Not very high quality
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is definitely worth the investment! The pieces are mostly useful, once you figure out how to use it. There are no instructions included, so if you aren't good at figuring out how to put attachments together this might be a problem for you. I did have two of my mounts give me problems before the first use (the chest mount, the head mount), so I'm not sure if I will use them regularly. I would suggest a printed packet to explain the use of each piece - if that was included, a lot of people would have an easier time figuring out the mounts.
customer_reviews.author: GAKANE

customer_reviews.title: A lot of pieces but not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot of accessories but appear cheaply made plastic and won't last, especially the selfie stick. I'm not giving this a "one star" because the mounts and adhesive pads will come in handy on my motorcycle helmets. However won't know if they'll stick long enough until I place them on in the Spring. I'm mostly disappointed with the price. Package should have sold for $10-15.
customer_reviews.author: NAE

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but...
customer_reviews.text: As a few of the other reviewers said, some of the pieces are good only for one or two uses before developing rust or other issues. Overall, however, for those just starting out with GoPro or those who need a few of these pieces and don't want to spend a fortune on OEM products, this is a good buy. I will say that the empty case (its to the immediate right of the chest harness in the picture) barely fits the GoPro Hero3 Silver. I mean so tight it's almost not worth putting on as the plastic where it connects to the mount feels like it could break if I put any more stress on it. Anyway, good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: good for the price, but not actually good. the telescoping stick is really flimsy. it got rusty with a small amount of water exposure. wouldn't recommend for full size go pros. probably just the lighter session. same for the tripod thing. it can barely hold the full size go pro in any position. all of the other hardware is actually decent, except the handle portions of the bolts are too short and difficult to tighten because it hits the casing on the full size gopro as you twist.
customer_reviews.author: Lori and Lucien

customer_reviews.title: Okay products everything seems of good quality except the tripod and the buoy but you ...
customer_reviews.text: Okay products everything seems of good quality except the tripod and the buoy but you get what you pay for. My biggest problem with it is it smells like cigarette smoke. All of it. the package and every item inside. It has now made my entire apartment smell like cigarette smoke. I personally do not smoke and this really bothers me and my girlfriends lungs. I would not recommend ordering from these people ever. Very Poor regards for customer satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Rion

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal, but No Directions/Info Sheet
customer_reviews.text: You get all the items pictured which is very nice. My issue is I received no booklet, pamphlet, piece of directions or product list. I can guess of course what everything is, what it goes with and how it operates, but it would be nice to have the directions and pieces listed somewhere so I know I've got it right.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Theisen-Ross

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected with very bad quality
customer_reviews.text: For below Items cheap material and bad quality : -Extendable Handheld Monopod Pole. -Octopus Tripod -Black Tripod Mount Adapter other parts are okay, a gift also comes with but not for GoPro Hero 5 in the paid price you can get something better
customer_reviews.author: Sami Jabr

customer_reviews.title: Tripod broken :(
customer_reviews.text: This is a great package of accessories that I can't wait to use. However, the item that I specifically bought this for, the flexible tripod, came broken. The top piece that connects the actual GoPro holder to the tripod is cracked so it disconnects from the tripod. Very disappointing since I am going on vacation in a few days and wanted to use that a lot. If the provider or Amazon sees this, is there a way to replace just that one item rather than returning the whole package?
customer_reviews.author: Laci

customer_reviews.title: Great set of tools.
customer_reviews.text: Great kit so far, especially since it includes the selfie stick, floatation device (Yellow is great), and the octopus-wrapping thing. I have not had any missing pieces like a couple of the reviews mentioned. The quality of everything is the same as GoPro, just without the label. My only complaint is that there are a ton of pieces and it is a little daunting at first trying to figure out what each piece is used for. I have to keep referencing this page to see these items in use. Some instructions would have been great!
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great price for all you get.
customer_reviews.text: Great kit. I have a hero 5 and all accessories fit my camera. Need to use pictures from amazon to use accessories that you are not familiar with, to use them. No instructions included, but pretty easy to figure out. Includes a large bag thats handy. Also included a smaller bag for the smaller accessories. Will be putting it to the test soon.
customer_reviews.author: mana40

customer_reviews.title: Lots of parts
customer_reviews.text: Good thing there are a lot of parts. Tripod broke immediately, one of the tripod screw mounts busted while on the water and almost lost the camera. I like the extra parts and use several screws. Still haven't used them all. The suction cup seems to work very well but I will definitely put a lanyard on it while using it on the kayak as I should.
customer_reviews.author: K Cerney

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Great kit. Somethings you may not use or need, but can’t beat the price for the amount of things the kit has and the quality of the items. Have been using it like crazy since it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Worth every Dollar
customer_reviews.text: The LifeLimit Accessories Starter kit brought everything shown and proved to be great in all its versatility for Gopro Accessories. I would make this purchase again if I were to make it a gift for anyone looking to add to their GoPro accessories. Also, after a purchase like this you will not need to buy any other accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Rogër Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Get these accessories
customer_reviews.text: I got these to go with my Go Pro Hero 4 that I got 3 years ago. So I have used these items quite a lot since then. They hold up great and come with so many great accessories! I haven't had anything break on me yet.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Lots of options here
customer_reviews.text: This kit probably has everything that you could need for mounting your camera anywhere. Some of the pieces are not heavy duty, but for the price, if they work a few times before the plastic fatigues, then that is ok. I would buy again because of all the parts that make any mounting situation solveable.
customer_reviews.author: BrianInAz

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for a trip and it packed down nicely. It has all the pieces needed to go ...
customer_reviews.text: So many options for connections and wearing options for the GoPro in this kit. I bought it for a trip and it packed down nicely. It has all the pieces needed to go adventuring with your GoPro. Most are pretty high quality despite being packaged in a pack.
customer_reviews.author: major_critic.deal_lover

customer_reviews.title: Tripod snapped while being put in a pocket- flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was a great price and had everything I wanted for a new GoPro session- and the tripod snapped in half as my friend was putting it in his pocket at a bowling alley. Thankfully we weren't testing it's strength in an extreme setting, which is what I would hope the components would be made to withstand. I don't often write reviews- but the quality of this set is pretty lousy. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Odessa Fellows

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend this product. The tripod, arm strap mount, and screw were all defective. The selfie stick is not very sturdy at all!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Lacoste

customer_reviews.title: and if I had bought the official GoPro frame case it would've been like $30 just for that
customer_reviews.text: I'm astounded that all of this could be sold for $21. There are several pieces I would've expected to be $10+ on their own! I just kept pulling out more pieces that I didn't even notice in the pictures when I bought it! I really only needed the monopod and the frame case, and if I had bought the official GoPro frame case it would've been like $30 just for that. Yes, I'm sure the quality is not as good, but for my purposes I don't need any of these to be super durable. For the money you cannot go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product particularly for the value. Comes with everythong you could need to get started with your new go-pro. I especially like the wrist strap for underwater snorkeling
customer_reviews.author: Barry Ore

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great little kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great little kit for the price. I only needed a new suction cup and so for a few extra dollars, I got that and a ton more. No problems at all with anything so far, and I got to give my friend a selfie stick too since I already had one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need!
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy I found this kit for our GoPro! It has every accessory I could imagine and it is of an excellent, sturdy quality. We are new to the action cam world so we didn't really know what accessories we would need. After getting this kit I am not sure we even need anything else! We have already used the hand held floating mount, and the head strap and they worked perfectly. They are easy to mount and come with all the necessary pieces. I highly recommend this kit. Why waste money on buying the name brand, expensive accessories?!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Oldroyd

customer_reviews.title: good budget priced set up
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this kit for a few months now, with no issues. Is it clearly a knock off kit ? YES Does wit work perfectly fine for 98% of users? It sure will. Like most of us, I shop on a budget, especially for recreation type goodies. The price is right and the product delivers, I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas F. Ziebro

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how to use all of that
customer_reviews.text: The bag is great because it has a lot of everything, I don't even know how to use all the mounts it has. I think is very useful for any kind of situation where the gopro camera is going to be used.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rodas

customer_reviews.title: Comparing the Lifelimit Accessories Starter Kit for Gopro to the Black Pro Basic Common Outdoor Sports Kit for GoPro
customer_reviews.text: Comparing the Lifelimit Accessories Starter Kit for Gopro to the Black Pro Basic Common Outdoor Sports Kit for GoPro: Almost all of the pieces were identically the same, including the head mount, chest mount, car mount, and selfie stick. The Lifelimit kit had a flexible tripod and lots of small parts you can see in the picture. The Black Pro kit had a nicer handlebar mount and floaty handle. Both are great bargains for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: What a great deal for the money. High quality accessory items and virtually every kind of attachment that you will need to get going with your GoPro. Very pleased with the purchase. There are soooo many starter kits available that it is hard to know which one to get. Well, get this one for sure and don't worry about looking any further.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan R

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: There's no reason to drop $20 on just one accessory with a brand name on it when you can get a grab bag full of much more. I mianly got this for the floaty mount and tripod, but the other stuff opens up a wide range of possibilities. Get this first. If you really like a particular mount and want the "official" version of it, you can do that later. This assortment will cover all the basics and save your bank account.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Costa Rican Zip Line Rated
customer_reviews.text: OK, you'll probably not actually use more than 1/3 of this extensive collection of hardware, but since we'll all gravitate toward a different third, it's good that you're oversupplied. We used two pieces (handheld and chest strap) on zip lines in Costa Rica to cool effect! (What's more amazing is that although we're 76, we are 20 years younger than the oldest patron!) So it's tropics rated. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Parr

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Great price. Has all the pieces I wanted and much more. Others don't include the flexible tripod, this product does. No problems at all with the windshield suction cup, works well.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Juan

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper IS NOT better
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality. Weak plastic, slightly off measurements, easily breaks. Plastic seems brittle. Avoid this. It looks great but it wont add anything of value to your mounts.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy H

customer_reviews.title: They work just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, these are not official GoPro accessories but unless you are a hardcore outsider or professional as opposed to the occasional videographer, these will do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis B

customer_reviews.title: everything perfect except the screws!
customer_reviews.text: everything is as described, everything comes included, awesome deal, i just wish the screws were 2mm longer, they don't tighten in a way that makes the gopro sturdy. except for that small detail everything is great. i think i'm going to have to buy extra screws (i have some from my other oem gopro accessories I've been using) i wouldn't trust the screws in any crazy situations where i could lose my gopro forever.
customer_reviews.author: Ricochet.

customer_reviews.title: Best $20 I've spent in a long time
customer_reviews.text: Best $20 I've spent in a long time. Tons of useful items for my GoPro kits. I've even given parts of it away and repurchased the entire kit. Great value and bang for the buck. (I'm like Nasa sometimes, redundancy is key)
customer_reviews.author: Papa Gigadee

customer_reviews.title: This kit does not fit the hero 5 black as ...
customer_reviews.text: This kit does not fit the hero 5 black as described, unless i'm missing something. also, some parts are made of cheap materials.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Some bits are outstanding, others are so-so. but overall this is an Excellent Value. There are so many little knuckles and joints you almost end up using them just because you have them. Word of caution if your windshield is highly curved. The suction cup mount is best for flat glass. If you try to mount it on a very curved section of your windshield the suction cup does not suction. Which means it does not suck - which in this case is bad.
customer_reviews.author: gf

customer_reviews.title: Read before buying
customer_reviews.text: Garbage....the mounts are made of a weak plastic that breaks within a week. The mounts also aren't the same size as the official gopro one, so there is a lot more free play with the gipro than I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very generous assortment of attachments
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an Apeman camera on Amazon for $54 and all the attachments but one fit my camera. I'm very happy with the generous assortment of attachments they included and they're very easy to figure out. I'm looking forward to using them this summer! 5 stars for quick delivery and the many attachments, I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: The mounts that actually tighten work good, but too many don't tighten
customer_reviews.text: Many of the mounts won't tighten up to hold the camera still, so it's largely a useless pack for me. You do get quite a few mounts in here for the money, but if half don't work it's not that great of a deal. The selfie stick and floating mount work, but suction cup and bar mounts just flop around.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Bancs

customer_reviews.title: Also the suction cup holder doesn't stick good. It came all warped like it was creased ...
customer_reviews.text: Selfie stick is real wobbly with gopro on it. Also the mounting screws rusted the first time i used them underwater. Discolored the housing. Also the suction cup holder doesn't stick good. It came all warped like it was creased during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Everything in this kit is pretty decent except the pole
customer_reviews.text: Everything in this kit is pretty decent except the pole. It works fine with stock gopros but I have a extended battery and light mounted so the pole is a little flimsy. I order and different pole to use. But other then that the chest strap is nice and doesn't slip. The head strap has pads on the inner side to help hold the camera in place and ask the mounts came with 3m pads. All in all a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality poor
customer_reviews.text: Most of the stuff in this kit is fine. But the screws that come with it are too small and dont fit right when attaching mounts. However, the biggest problem was the tripod. It came broken and i didn’t realize, i was switching my camera to the tripod and it disconnected at the top and my camera fell down a cliff and broke. Quality is not checked. Very unhappy. However chest mount and others work as designed. Just be careful
customer_reviews.author: Hammertime524

customer_reviews.title: nothing is really good in the package
customer_reviews.text: nothing is really good in the package. Selfthy stick is worst. cheap plastic that smells toxic. Item quality is extremely low. Made in China from recycled material that you throw out into trash, Life is a circle I guess. You get what you pay for, which is $20 dollar for some sticky pads.
customer_reviews.author: bo cui

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how they can ship all these pieces for the price listed, but they are excellent. I have two GoPro's that I use on my Jeep, kayak and woodshop and I ended buying a second one of these kits just because I loved the first so much and couldn't believe the value. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Hupka

customer_reviews.title: Great kit without the GoPro price tag
customer_reviews.text: This kit has just about everything you need to start filming your probably boring life, at least that's what I realized once I bought my GoPro. One thing I don't like about the kit is the suction cup piece. The weight of the camera alone is enough to tip it over. Do not use if camera could be endanger of being broken.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Rushing

customer_reviews.title: lots of accessories, wish it came with instructions with ...
customer_reviews.text: lots of accessories, wish it came with instructions with ideas on what you can do with each accessory, and no case for the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Israel Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Screw are made with poor stainless steel and black plastic is fragile (two pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: Not convinced by quality, especially for water parts. Screw are made with poor stainless steel and black plastic is fragile (two pieces broken in two weeks).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not bad.
customer_reviews.text: I know this is not the real GoPro items and they are cheaper than the original but I was hoping for better yet again I am not mad with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eyra

customer_reviews.title: VERY nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This set is very nice, and frankly it does not seem that cheap to me, I have read quite a bit of reviews not only on this product but I would say at least 30-40 others and frankly I liked this one for the price and what it had. Once I got it, I was very pleased with the contents. One thing is it would be GREAT if it had some instructions although I gotta say that after spending a little time with the kit, you probably won't need them, Overall I like it and am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Q

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: I borrowed a friend's GoPro for a trip to Hawaii and wanted to get an accessory set that had various mounts for different uses, that we could also give our friend after as a thank you. This was perfect! All pieces were easy to use and great quality. Comes in a nice case and carrying bag as well.
customer_reviews.author: GRLmom

customer_reviews.title: Good price - Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall the package is a good deal, but due to the price the quality is not there. I used the chest strap while at the beach playing football and the clip that goes to the chest piece broke apart. The adjustable bracket is held together by three small set screws that dont anchor the pieces together sufficiently. All in all it is a bargain for what you get and how much you pay. If you're wanting the best bang for your buck this is the package for you. Please beware the quality of the items reflect the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but that is a good thing and given the price
customer_reviews.text: More accessories than i think ill ever need for my gopro, but that is a good thing and given the price, its great to have spare mounts. The bag it comes with fits everything nicely and keeps all of it together so you can easily pour the contents out and find what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Victor J. Garza

customer_reviews.title: Decent starter kit for your GoPro 3+
customer_reviews.text: Very comprehensive selection of mounts. It is a great way to introduce yourself to the would of GoPro accessories. Way note than the average consumer will use. The only faulty product I have found so far is the window suction mount. It does not want to stay but since it is not a major item for my uses it really doesn't bother me much.
customer_reviews.author: S. Slone

customer_reviews.title: Go Pro Go
customer_reviews.text: Great attachments for Go Pro. They came in handy while we where in Hawaii for the second time. Material is cheap car suction cup thing broke other than that everything else worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: David Moran Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price, would recommend for first goPro accessory purchase.
customer_reviews.text: So many parts for such a small price! Seems like every conceivable accessory you will ever need is in this pack. Haven't even begun to use everything, and I can't see ever needing anything not in this pack as a occasional user of a goPro. May not satisfy a vlogger or super sporty goPro user, but for us everyday folks it's a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: C. S.

customer_reviews.title: All mounts and brackets you need to do just about anything
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these for years now and the things we use all work great. There is a ton of stuff in this kit.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: What is this?
customer_reviews.text: I received the kit in the mail right on time. Everything looks good, nothing broken. I haven't testing everything out, but so far so good. The only negative thing I can say is that it came with no instructions or key; there were a couple of things that I still am unsure about. With a little digging, I'm sure I'll figure it out, it just would have been nice. I'd recommend this to anyone who just wants to mess around with their GoPro and doesn't have the means to purchase the "serious" gear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a starter kit for my GoPro Hero 4 Silver. I wanted to test out different accessories and see what I like before buying others, and this seemed like a good deal. Everything seems ok quality. The Frame seems cheap, and I don't feel safe using it on my GoPro. All the mounts seem sturdy. The only issue I have is that my GoPro brand quick release buckles do not fit in the suction mount, chest mount or anything requiring the quick release buckle.
customer_reviews.author: Jess S.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap accessories
customer_reviews.text: Is not really worth it even though this kit is very cheap but the tripod moved all the time in the top base, is weak and cheap made, other accessories were ok. I feel like I bought a bag of trash that now I don’t know what to do with it
customer_reviews.author: Chow

customer_reviews.title: It was a great price so I’m not too upset that several prices ...
customer_reviews.text: Meh...you get you pay for. It was a great price so I’m not too upset that several prices have either cracked or broke within a few months. It’s a decent collection of products to test to see if I really want to invest in something more long term
customer_reviews.author: Muttface

customer_reviews.title: The selfie stick is literally the exact same stick as ...
customer_reviews.text: The selfie stick is literally the exact same stick as the one I have for my phone. Definitely cheaper material but it will work for what I plan to do. The housing piece did not fit my go pro hero 5. It was too small. But everything else will work as long as I get the housing for my camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Yamashiro

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for what the price you pay.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is on the cheaper side but the value of what you get for the price is truly astounding. The chest strap seems just like the OEM gopro version. This is an amazing value for accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Alaskaman77

customer_reviews.title: Suction cup mount is a little cheap
customer_reviews.text: When I went through all that this package had to offer I was a little bummed out on the quality. The suction cup mount really had to be cranked down in order not to move as easily as it did. Ive also used a quite a few suction mounts over the time to realize that it won't last a super long time. That its everything youd expect to pay with. The price could have been marked down a little more but other than that I guess it was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Gonna break plastic.
customer_reviews.text: 1Year review: Cheap plastic connectors that bust... when you really need them. BUY ALUMINUM!
customer_reviews.author: Dpneverton

customer_reviews.title: Suction Cup Issues
customer_reviews.text: The suction cup mount isn't the best quality- only sticks to glossy surfaces like glass- and it fell off my side view mirror when I was going like 25 mph. Good thing I had my hand out behind it (and caught it) or I might've had a damaged GoPro. The suction cup also stuck to my car's sheet metal, but I was able to remove it without flipping the release tab. For the most part, this is a decent accessory kit (especially) considering the price, but I would buy the official GoPro suction cup mount as well if you'd like to utilize suction cup mounts.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: I saw some of the poor reviews on amazon but decided to order it anyway ...
customer_reviews.text: I saw some of the poor reviews on amazon but decided to order it anyway since it was cheap. Yup, as predicted, the quality is cheap! The screwes were broken by the time I reached my destination where I was planning to use it. Yeah, don't do it!
customer_reviews.author: Arjuna Ravikumar

customer_reviews.title: Love these! To be completely honest I was expecting ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! To be completely honest I was expecting these to feel more "cheap" seeing as theyre not gopro brand and I didnt do much research before ordering but everything feels solid and good quality! Ive used the chest and head strap the most so far and theyre too much fun, defnitely a must have addition to your gopro.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Now we can gopro everything....
customer_reviews.text: Good set. Lots of stuff. Save the $ get this set. Only thing missing is a few different water floating devices for the GoPro Heroes and the hero sessions. Thats why only 4 stars. We would by again!
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: What a bargain
customer_reviews.text: There is so much stuff in this that I am not sure I will ever use it all but thankful that we have it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Still agent even used all of the pieces it cane with. Would buy again and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GONZO

customer_reviews.title: Great equipment
customer_reviews.text: The caring cats is great minus the foam on the inside. But all the actual equipment are phenomenal. Very versatile and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Go Pro things
customer_reviews.text: I use the sticky pad holder things only. All the other things are not of the best quality. The tripod works but will be flimsy after a while. For the price its hard to beat since it includes all the random other things people will need if they are into sports and riding bikes. I use it for the car rides and still shots.
customer_reviews.author: BazookaTooth805

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, it has More than enough pieces for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great kit, it has More than enough pieces for you to attach the camera to ANY and everything...The extension poles is not my favorite part as it gets loose quickly but the rest is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Comes with alot of items for very little money. ...
customer_reviews.text: Comes with alot of items for very little money. All works with my new GoPro Hero 5 session!! Must have items if you own a GoPro. Well worth
customer_reviews.author: Alex I.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this product. The attachments seldom work on my hero 5 black. I can only really use the tripod since it's the only one that kind of works. Very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: Not the most durable (I snapped one of the mount brackets because I am a dumb oaf, but there are plenty of them so ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent accessory set. Cheap, but gets the job done. The helmet mounts all come with that 3m adhesive that is proven to work. Not the most durable (I snapped one of the mount brackets because I am a dumb oaf, but there are plenty of them so it wasn't an issue.
customer_reviews.author: YJL

customer_reviews.title: Everything everyone needs
customer_reviews.text: Get this set if you need to mount your go pro an where, All mounts are included
customer_reviews.author: Peter Michael

product_meta.title: Lifelimit Accessories Starter Kit Compatible with Gopro Hero 8/7/6/Fusion/5/Session 4/3/2/HD Hero Black Silver Cameras WiMius Rollei QUMOX Campark AKASO APEMAN DBPOWER
product_meta.description:
This kit is compatible with All Gopro Hero 7/6//Session/4/3/2/HD/LCD Black Silver Cameras
LifeLimit more professional more possibility 
This accessorie Kit includes Everything you need for your GoPro camera,High qulity and durable,and you'r full covered by us after you purchasing our products,one-year warrenty of every pieces you buy from us. Now,go and get whatever you like. 
Kit Includes: 
1 x Octopus Tripod 
1 x Suction cup 
1 x Floaty bobber with strap and screw 
1 x 360-degree Rotation Clip & Screw . 
1 x Extendable Handheld Monopod Pole 
1 x Bicycle Handlebar / Seatpost Clamp with Three-way Adjustable Pivot Arm 
4x Flat & 4x Curved Mounts with adhesive pads 
1 x chest harness 
1 x Headstrap Mount 
1 x LifeLimite large size pouch 
1 x 360-degree Rotation, New Wrist Mount 
1 x Black Tripod Mount Adapter 
2 x Gopro Surface J-Hook 
5 x long thumbscrew 

Warranty Policy: 

30-Day Money Back Guarantee & 12 Months Limited Product Warranty (caused by non-artificial quality issue, excluding man-made damage for every purchase from us.） 

Professional technical support, Efficient and always satisfied customer service 24 * 7 available.
feature_bullets: Chest strap：Let you wear all GoPro cameras (except Digital HERO 5 Wrist Camera) on your chest Comfortable, fully-adjustable design fits all shapes and sizes, including over large jackets Perfect mount for skiing, kayaking, biking, motocross, equestrian and other action sports Lets you capture your knees & skis on the slopes, or your bike frame & handlebars Easy way to share the filming with your friends
Headband：FEATURES of the Head Strap Mount Fully adjustable to fit all sizes, the Head Strap is compatible with all GoPro cameras and great for keeping the footage clear while you shred

Bicycle clip：Handlebar Seatpost Mount Part of the GoPro Hero Camera is its go-anywhere versatility. And to make the most of it, you may want to be able to mount the camera securely to your bike. With the Mounting Clamp, you can attach your camera to any round or semi-round tube from 19 - 35mm in diameter. So you can have your camera on the chainstays, seatpost, handlebars, or even on the fork legs. Whatever view you choose, you can capture it.
The GoPro Handlebar Mounting Clamp includes the tool-free handlebar clamp and a three-way adjustable pivot arm so you can position the camera housing at any angle relative to the clamp.
